EN.name: White Water Ballad
EN.desc4: While the equipper is within any <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>, their CRIT Rate increases by 12%. After leaving the <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color>, this buff persists for 15 seconds. When the equipper is an <color=#FFFFFF>[Attack]</color> Character, activating or extending the duration of <color=#FFFFFF>[Ether Veil]</color> additionally increases their CRIT Rate by 12% for 30 seconds; repeated triggers reset the duration.

EN.name: Proto Punk
EN.desc4: When any squad member triggers a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Evasive Assist</color>, all squad members deal 15% increased DMG, lasting 10s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

EN.name: Shining Aria
EN.desc4: When the equipper hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>[Basic Attack]</color>, their Anomaly Proficiency increases by 36 points for 8 seconds, repeated triggers reset the duration; when enemies on the field become Stunned, the equipper's DMG increases by 25% for 18 seconds, repeated triggers reset the duration.

EN.name: Freedom Blues
EN.desc4: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy, reduce the target's Anomaly Buildup RES to the equipper's Attribute by 20% for 8s. This effect does not stack with others of the same attribute.

EN.name: Swing Jazz
EN.desc4: Launching a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases all squad members' DMG by 15% for 12s. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

EN.name: Branch & Blade Song
EN.desc4: When Anomaly Mastery exceeds or equals 115 points, the equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 30%. When any squad member applies <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color> or triggers the <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color> effect on an enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate increases by 12%, lasting 15s.

EN.name: Puffer Electro
EN.desc4: <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> DMG increases by 20%. Launching an <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> increases the equipper's ATK by 15% for 12s.

EN.name: King of the Summit
EN.desc4: When the equipper is a Stun character and uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, increases CRIT DMG of all squad members by 15%, and when the equipper's CRIT Rate is more than or equal to 50%, further increases CRIT DMG by 15%, lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

EN.name: Moonlight Lullaby
EN.desc4: When the equipper is a Support character and uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, the DMG dealt by all squad members increases by 18% for 25s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

EN.name: Shockstar Disco
EN.desc4: <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color>, and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counters</color> inflict 20% more Daze to the main target.

EN.name: Astral Voice
EN.desc4: Whenever any squad member enters the field using a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color>, all squad members gain 1 stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Astral</color>, up to a maximum of 3 stacks, and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. Each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Astral</color> increases the DMG dealt by the character entering the field using a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> by 8%. Passive effects of the same name do not stack.

EN.name: Yunkui Tales
EN.desc4: When using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color>, CRIT Rate increases by 4%, stacking up to 3 times and lasting 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When having 3 stacks of this effect, Sheer DMG increases by 10%.

EN.name: Thunder Metal
EN.desc4: As long as an enemy in combat is <color=#2EB6FF>Shocked</color>, the equipper's ATK is increased by 28%.

EN.name: Shadow Harmony
EN.desc2: The DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershocks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> is increased by 15%.
EN.desc4: Upon hitting an enemy with an <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, if the DMG dealt aligns with the equipper's attribute, the equipper gains 1 stack of a buff effect, at most once per use of a skill. For each stack, the equipper's ATK increases by 4%, and CRIT Rate increases by 4%. The effect can stack up to 3 times and lasts for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

EN.name: Dawn's Bloom
EN.desc4: Increases <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> DMG by 20%. When equipped by an Attack character, using an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate</color> will further increase <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> DMG by 20% for 25s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.

EN.name: Soul Rock
EN.desc4: Upon receiving an enemy attack and losing HP, the equipper takes 40% less DMG for 2.5s. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

EN.name: Polar Metal
EN.desc4: Increase the DMG of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color> by 20%. When any squad member inflicts <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color> or <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>, this effect increases by an additional 20% for 12s.

EN.name: Fanged Metal
EN.desc4: Whenever a squad member inflicts <color=#F0D12B>Assault</color> on an enemy, the equipper deals 35% additional DMG to the target for 12s.

EN.name: Chaos Jazz
EN.desc4: <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> and <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> increases by 15%. While off-field, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG increases by 20%. When switching on-field, this buff continues for 5s, and this continuation effect can trigger once every 7.5s.

EN.name: Phaethon's Melody
EN.desc4: When any squad member uses an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color>, the equipper's Anomaly Proficiency increases by 45 for 8s. If the character using the <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> is not the equipper, the equipper's <color=#FE437E>Ether DMG</color> is increased by 25%.

EN.name: Hormone Punk
EN.desc4: Upon becoming the active character in combat, the equipper's ATK increases by 25% for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 20s.

EN.name: Inferno Metal
EN.desc4: Upon hitting a <color=#FF5521>Burning</color> enemy, the equipper's CRIT Rate is increased by 28% for 8s.

EN.name: Woodpecker Electro
EN.desc4: Landing a critical hit on an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> increases the equipper's ATK by 9% for 6s. The buff duration for different skills are calculated separately.

EN.name: Chaotic Metal
EN.desc4: The equipper's CRIT DMG increases by 20%. When any character in the squad triggers <color=#FE437E>Corruption's</color> additional DMG, this effect further increases by 5.5% for 8s, stacking up to 6 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
